column4: on a side note, does anyone know where to specify a specific refresh rate for xorg?  i know about refresh rates and resolutions, but when you select 'refresh rate' in gui, where does that get stored in a text file?  i have a resolution thats not working under vmware and need to forcibly drop down to 60hz
i know, where exactly do you force a 1024x76 to either be 60hz or 75? i don't see the relationship between default/current refresh rate and default/current resolution?
